text: The film replaced "What's My Line?" and "Be My Guest" programmes because of an electricians' strike. It showed Britain today through the eyes of an American TV reporter, Eric Sevareid, and British personalities. Among them - Professor Dennis Brogan, Shelagh Delaney, and Alan Sillitoe. The film covered a wide aspect of the British scene, ranging from pubs, the Eton wall game, to the European Common Market.
